__e: Holy shit. What happened to your face?
Stop it, I said I'm coming. I told you I'm coming. Give me time to get there!
Good heavens, what is to become of us now?
Every single day of my life
I MEAN, YOU'RE GONNA BE LOOKING AT THE SAME WOMAN'S FACE DAY AFTER DAY, WHICH COULD BE A BEAUTIFUL THING.
Every single day I wake up and I think of a reason not to do it. Every single day.
Any saint wants to get me married will have to get up very early in the morning.
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost, so be it.
Now you've come you mustn't leave just like that. You need to give me your grace.
I'll give you goddamn Santo Domingo.
You'll come back with a new boat. Then we'll both go to Santo Domingo.

You see my husband as a saint, and so he must be right in everything he says and does.
He is a saint ... and we ..."
You should know by now, he sees the Holy Father every day.

Better that the Holy Father does not know my book, I say this for your own good.
